metadata.description: A Claude Code plugin marketplace for full-stack development

plugins.name: fullstack-develop
plugins.description: A collection of full-stack development skills for frontend design and architecture

skills.name: frontend-design-3d
skills.description: Create immersive 3D web experiences with Three.js, CSS 3D transforms, and interactive animations

skills.name: frontend-design-blur-grainy
skills.description: Create dreamy UI with glassmorphism, blur effects, soft gradients, and film grain textures

skills.name: nextjs-fullstack-architecture
skills.description: Build production-ready Next.js apps with T3 Stack (Supabase, tRPC, Drizzle, shadcn/ui)
